Did you join in fireworks celebrations? Did you attend a cookout, parade, or head to the beach? Share your favorite July 4th moments with us.

Statue of Liberty opens as US salutes July 4th

Lady Liberty reopened 8 months after Superstorm Sandy closed the national symbol of freedom.

Joey Chestnut wins 7th hot dog eating contest
69 franks downed at the men's Fourth of July hot dog eating contest.

A dark Fourth in Maine

A man died in a collision when a parade in Bangor was rerouted after shots were fired by a man who was eventually arrested after a four-hour standoff.

Tyler Seguin traded from Bruins to Dallas Stars

The No. 2 pick of the 2010 draft has left Boston in a blockbuster seven-player trade, a team source confirmed Thursday. Bruins Rich Peverley and minor-leaguer Ryan Button are also part of the trade.

Milton teen dies after bicycling group is struck by car in Arkansas

A teenage girl from Milton has died from injuries sustained when she and six other bicyclists were hit by a car in Arkansas on Tuesday, authorities said.
